TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Gipun, title = Gipun, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gipun} }

S.FORM: Gipun hya' ga cyux maki' tay 36 00 N, 138 00 E na Aziya' syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 377,915 sq km (maki' tay 62ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 364,485 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 13,430 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 126,702,133. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga 12.50% , lhlahuy hya' ga 68.50%, sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 19%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Tokyo. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 23 na tay mawpuw sazing byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Akihito, aring ryax 7 squ byacing tay 1 sa kawas 1989 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' CIA 外交部

Gipon hya' ga cyox maki' tay 36 00 N, 138 00 E na Aziya' syow. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 377,915 sq km (maki' tay 62ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 364,485 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilong hya' ga 13,430 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' sqoliq hya' ga 126,702,133. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahon hya' ga 12.50% , lhlahoy hya' ga 68.50%, sni' naha' sa pptzyowaw sa bzinah hya' ga 19%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' kraho' qalang hya' ga Tokyo. snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' hya' ga 23 na tay mawpow sazing byacing na qotox kawas. mrhow Kokka' mrhow Kokka' ta' misow hya' ga Akihito, aring ryax 7 sqo byacing tay 1 sa kawas 1989 lga, mosa' spazyang balay ms'rox kya la. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' CIA 外交部
